word_mean: 渗出物，渗出液：从血管渗出并沉积在组织中或组织表面的物质，如体液、细胞或细胞碎屑，通常由炎症所致。渗出液不同于漏出为其蛋白质、细胞或由细胞衍化的固体物质等含量高

sentence.Network_en: Commonly the muzzle is encrusted with mucus and exudate.
sentence.Network_cn: 鼻镜通常覆盖着粘液和渗出物.

sentence.Network_en: An inflammatory exudate collects on the surface.
sentence.Network_cn: 炎性渗出物集合在表面.

sentence.Network_en: Purulent exudate may unite the eyelids.
sentence.Network_cn: 脓性渗出物使上下眼脸粘连.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 在炎症渗出液（exudate）内蛋白质含量较高，并含有较多的细胞成分和其碎屑。因而由炎症所引起的浆膜腔渗出液，比重高于1.020…

list.abs: ...心肌细胞变性坏死,导致严重的心功能障碍,  ,二,渗出性炎渗出性炎,exudative inflammation,是指以渗出为主要病变的炎症,以炎症灶内有大量渗出物形成为主要特征,根据渗出物的主要成分和病变特点.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from Latin exsudat- 'exuded', from the verb exsudare

means.word_mean: 1. a substance that oozes out from animal or plant pores
1. release (a liquid) in drops or small quantities;

auth_sentence.content: Only with the onset of Morgellons did I recall those strange scalp lesions and exudate--could it be a biofilm?
